title: Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (No. 27 of 2005) (as adapted by
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health and Social Care Professionals
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health and Social Care Professionals 
Act 2005 (Special measures registration having regard to Covid-19) (No. 2) 
Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health social care professional act 2005 (special measure registration regard covid-19) (no 2) order 2020

title: Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (No. 27 of 2005) (as adapted by
heading: 2. The 30th of June 2021 is specified as the different date for the purposes
text_raw:
2. The 30th of June 2021 is specified as the different date for the purposes 

of section 98(6) of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 December, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [689] 3
text_norm: 2 30th june 2021 specified different date purpose section 98(6) health social care professional act 2005 given official seal 23 december 2020 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 5th january 2021 689 3

title: Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (No. 27 of 2005) (as adapted by
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order specifies 30 June 2021 as the date on which a Section 98 registration 
still in force shall cease to have effect. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [689]
